name: Shawn Lee
description: '''Shawn Lee''' (born 1963) is an American musician, producer, composer and [[multi-instrumentalist]]. He is the co-founder of London-based [[soft rock]] duo [[Young Gun Silver Fox]], along with Andy Platts. He is known for creating the entire score for the acclaimed video game ''[[Bully (video game)|Bully]]''. His song,  Kiss the Sky, was featured in the [[Telltale Games|Telltale]] video game ''[[Tales from the Borderlands]]''. He is currently working on an upcoming album ''Janktone Productions'', composed primarily of cheap and fun home-made instruments. There is no set release date. He currently lives in London, England.
